Reference

Indices of Effect Size

cohens_f() epsilon_squared() eta_squared() omega_squared()

Effect size for ANOVA

cohens_d() hedges_g() glass_delta()

Effect size for differences

Standardization

standardize()

Standardization (Z-scoring)

standardize_parameters() standardize_posteriors()

Parameters standardization

standardize_info()

Get Standardization Information

Interpretation

interpret()

Generic function for interpretation

interpret_d() interpret_g() interpret_delta()

Standardized difference interpretation

interpret_bf()

Bayes Factor (BF) Interpretation

interpret_direction()

Direction interpretation

interpret_ess() interpret_rhat() interpret_rope()

Bayesian indices interpretation

interpret_gfi() interpret_agfi() interpret_nfi() interpret_nnfi() interpret_cfi() interpret_rmsea() interpret_srmr() interpret_rfi() interpret_ifi() interpret_pnfi()

Interpretation of indices of fit

interpret_odds()

(Log) Odds ratio interpretation

interpret_omega_squared()

ANOVA effect size interpretation

interpret_p()

p-values interpretation

interpret_r()

Correlation interpretation

interpret_r2()

Coefficient of determination (R2) interpretation

interpret_parameters()

rules() is.rules()

Conversion

chisq_to_phi() convert_chisq_to_phi() phi_to_chisq() convert_phi_to_chisq() chisq_to_cramers_v() convert_chisq_to_cramers_v()

Conversion between Effect sizes for Contingency Tables (Chi2, Phi, Cramer's V...)

convert_posteriors_to_r() posteriors_to_r() convert_posteriors_to_t() posteriors_to_t()

Convert posterior distributions from a Bayesian model

t_to_r() convert_t_to_r() t_to_d() convert_t_to_d() z_to_r() convert_z_to_r() z_to_d() convert_z_to_d() F_to_r() convert_F_to_r() F_to_d() convert_F_to_d()

Convert test statistics (t, z, F) to effect sizes of differences (Cohen's d) or association (partial r).

percentage_to_d() d_to_percentage() convert_percentage_to_d() convert_d_to_percentage() d_to_r() r_to_d() convert_d_to_r() convert_r_to_d() odds_to_d() convert_odds_to_d() d_to_odds() convert_d_to_odds() r_to_odds() convert_r_to_odds() odds_to_r() convert_odds_to_r() odds_to_probs() probs_to_odds() convert_odds_to_probs() convert_probs_to_odds()

General effect size conversion

F_to_partial_eta_squared() t_to_partial_eta_squared() F_to_partial_epsilon_squared() t_to_partial_epsilon_squared() F_to_adj_partial_eta_squared() t_to_adj_partial_eta_squared() F_to_partial_omega_squared() t_to_partial_omega_squared()

Convert test statistics (F, t) to indices of variance explained (partial Eta / Omega / Epsilon squared)
